description: This file defines the root layout component for a Remix.run web application using React. It sets up external links to stylesheets, and provides the main app structure including meta tags, links, outlet rendering, and scripts.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links and preconnects for stylesheets and fonts used in the layout.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React functional component that provides the HTML skeleton and layout structure.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
